transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji sir bataiye.

Customer: Hello madam.
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Hello. Haan ye aap hi ko phone. Ye kya bolta hai isme ye baat kar rahe hai sir.
Executive: Sir ki aawaz nahi clear aa rahi hai.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan wo Indian Mart ka app app install ho jayega na PC mein?
Executive: Wo register number se hi hoga sir jo primary number hai usse se hoga bas.
Customer: Register app hai na uska directly website mein jana padega direct.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ah phone mein to app hai aapka PC ke liye app hai kya uska?
Executive: Nahi PC ke liye nahi hai sir PC ke liye aapko website se hi open karna padta hai.
Customer: Achcha wo uska link bataya na thoda sa.
Executive: Sir ek minute mein time dijiyega sir main lunch pe hoon abhi kar rahi hoon aapko call back.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to install IndiaMART app on PC.



Resolution:

- Informed that PC requires website access.
- Executive will provide the website link later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after lunch.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- app installation, pc, website link
